summary: An ordinance relating to zoning and providing for the rezoning of Blocks 1 to 6 inclusive, Gwinn's Laurelhurst Manor Addition except Lot 12, Block 6, said addition, and a portion of the unplatted property in the southwest quarter of Section 10, Township 25 North, Range 4 East, W. M. adjoining, with respect to Use Districts, and amending Ordinance No. 45382, as amended, by adding thereto one new section numbered 2-183.
